title: Ecological Dynamics of Sports Performance: Expert Competency Enhancement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Sports Science Theory and Fundamental Understanding of Exercise Mechanics
context.additional_context: Provides simplified content optimized for smartphone-based real-time classes, designed around expert-learner interactions.

learning_goals: Interaction patterns in sports performance environments can be analyzed by applying ecological dynamics theory.
Performance enhancement strategies can be designed by evaluating individual-environment coordination relationships.
Affordance utilization and adaptive learning environments can be designed through real-world case studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
